ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | issubg.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_id | |- ( G e. Grp -> G e. Grp ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ssid | |- B C_ B |
| 4 | 3 | #P_a1i | |- ( G e. Grp -> B C_ B ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_ressid | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( G |`s B ) = G ) |
| 6 | 5, 2 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( G |`s B ) e. Grp ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_issubg | |- ( B e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> ( G e. Grp /\ B C_ B /\ ( G |`s B ) e. Grp ) ) |
| 8 | 2, 4, 6, 7 | #P_syl3anbrc | |- ( G e. Grp -> B e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
